    • Uses of IReadScope in com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto

      Subinterfaces of IReadScope in com.ibm.team.scm.common.dto 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IContributorDeferringScope
      An item with contributor deferring scope: must be owned by a contributor defers read access decisions to a project area.
      interface  IPrivateScope
      An item with private scope is visible only to the owner.
      interface  IProcessAreaScope
      An item with this scope is owned by a process area.
      interface  IPublicScope
      Items with this scope may be read by all contributors.
      interface  ITeamAreaPrivateScope
      Items with this scope must be owned by a team area.
      interface  IUnknownScope
      Indicates that the scope is not known to the client.
